document.full_text: kfc parent yum brands inc  posted higher-than-expected quarterly sales fueled by growth in china, its biggest profit driver, and its shares rose 6.4 percent after hours.
document.title: yum sales surprise, up on strength in china
lines_and_colors: kfc parent yum brands inc  posted higher-than-expected quarterly sales fueled by growth in china, its biggest profit driver, and its shares rose 6.4 percent after hours.
